attributes.action: Remark the GCSE English Papers in England, - as is currently being done in Wales
attributes.additional_details:
To force the government to remark English GCSE papers of England students; as the grade boundaries were forced up due to extreme pressure from Education Secretary Michael Gove. There are letters to prove that the grade boundaries were unfairly raised, and a remark has been ordered for Welsh students who took the exam by the Welsh education minister Leighton Andrews.

This should be done in England to.
